      • isPrime

        static boolean isPrime​(java.math.BigInteger num,
                       int trials)
        Test is num is a prime, using the Miller-Rabin test.
        Parameters:
        num - is the tested number
        trials - is the number of tests; the certainity level
        Returns:
        true, if num is probably a prime, false if num surely composite

      • preCrt

        static java.math.BigInteger[] preCrt​(java.math.BigInteger p,
                                     java.math.BigInteger q)
        Calculate p*M_p and q*M_q, where M_p = p^-1 (mod q) and M_q = q^-1 (mod p). The returned multipliers then can be used for solve the X = x_1 mod (p) X = x_2 mod (q) simultaneous equations by X = x_q*c[0] + x_p*c[1].
        Parameters:
        p - prime
        q - another prime
        Returns:
        c[]: two-element array of multpliers

      • crt

        static java.math.BigInteger crt​(java.math.BigInteger x,
                                java.math.BigInteger e,
                                java.math.BigInteger[] primes,
                                java.math.BigInteger[] c)
        Calculate x^e (mod p*q) applying the chinese remainder theorem. (x = x_q*c[0] + x_p*c[1])
        Parameters:
        x -
        e -
        primes - an array with p and q in it
        c - array of two multiplicants
        Returns:
